title:
A zero-density estimate for $L$-functions associated with $\rm GL(3)$
  Hecke--Maass cusp forms
abstract:
In this paper, we establish an asymptotic formula for the twisted second
moment of $L$-functions associated with Hecke--Maass cusp forms for $\rm
SL(3,\mathbb{Z})$, and further deduce a weighted zero-density estimate for
these $L$-functions in the spectral aspect which may have important
applications in other problems.
